nodes.message: Shawn Caught by Terk in the Great Hall during the day

nodes.text: You there - Conner! What are you doing wandering around the halls?
Conner!

nodes.message: Shawn Caught again while in room

nodes.text: I expect to see you wearing an Official School Uniform during school hours from now on - do you understand me? If you don't have one by next week, it will be 20 demerits.

nodes.message: Checking to see if Shawn hasn't been given the Quest.

nodes.text: You are wearing the school uniform, I see. It's a slight improvement to your appearance.
I expect to see you wearing an Official School Uniform during school hours from now on - do you understand me? If you don't have one by next week, it will be 20 demerits.

nodes.message: Checking to see if Shawn hasn't been given the Quest.

nodes.text: You are wearing the school uniform, I see. It's a slight improvement to your appearance.
Twenty demerits for not wearing your official university uniform during school hours. You had better be wearing your uniform soon or you'll earn 30 demerits.
You are wearing the school uniform, I see. It's a slight improvement to your appearance.
Twenty demerits for not wearing your official university uniform during school hours. You had better be wearing your uniform the next time I see you or you'll earn 30 demerits.
Why aren't you wearing your school uniform like you were ordered? Thirty demerits! You are incorrigible.

nodes.message: Set [Terk: GerhardLetter] when Shawn shows Terk the Stationery
Default: Terk comments on other, non-special days
Terk complains to Shawn during unimportant events or 2nd time caught in a day

nodes.text: Shouldn't you be studying your lessons right now? Get to it!
No lollygagging around here.
You're wasting time, Conner.
This isn't sightseeing time - it's practice time. Go study.
Don't be such a slacker, Conner. Get to work.
Move along.
There's no excuse for wasting time.
You need to find better things to do with yourself than wander the halls - or shall I find you something to do instead?
You are wearing the school uniform, I see. It's a slight improvement to your appearance.
Twenty demerits for not wearing your official university uniform during school hours. You had better be wearing your uniform the next time I see you or you'll earn 30 demerits.
Why aren't you wearing your school uniform like you were ordered? Thirty demerits! You are incorrigible.
You must wear your school uniform at all times!
Conner! I see you continue to flaunt school rules and walk around in that ridiculous outfit rather than your uniform. This behavior won't be tolerated.
You are a disgrace to this school, Conner! I expect you to wear your school uniform during school hours.
